mapper.select: select id, titile, breif, introduction, start_time, picture, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ws_activity where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ws_activity(titile, breif, introduction, start_time, picture, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{titile}, #{breif}, #{introduction}, #{startTime}, #{picture}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into ws_activity(titile, breif, introduction, start_time, picture, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.titile}, #{entity.breif}, #{entity.introduction}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.picture}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into ws_activity(titile, breif, introduction, start_time, picture, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.titile}, #{entity.breif}, #{entity.introduction}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.picture}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update titile = values(titile), breif = values(breif), introduction = values(introduction), start_time = values(start_time), picture = values(picture), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update ws_activity
titile = #{titile},
breif = #{breif},
introduction = #{introduction},
start_time = #{startTime},
picture = #{picture},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
